1.content:
You sit in the den of the lodge, listening to your iPod and building a plastic model car. It's always been a hobby of yours, and it passes the time. That's what you really like about it, because anything that keeps you away from your aunts is a good thing. You know if you're around them too long, one of them will do something to make you feel awful. It could be something they say or physically do (though they've never actually hurt you physically, just mentally and verbally), and since you have to spend the summer in this lodge with them, you'd like to avoid that as long as possible.

The one good thing, if you can call it that, is that you think their feet are somewhat attractive. In some ways you feel bothered thinking that because they are your aunts, after all, and having a foot fetish is the last thing you'd want them to know about, but you can't deny sexy is sexy.

You try to push thoughts of them away for a moment and concentrate on building the model car again. You're just about finished, and sure enough it looks like a white Camaro, just like the box says. You smile and admire your handiwork when you hear footsteps. It's one of your aunts coming, but which one?
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
It turns out to be your Aunt Vicky. She pads onto the carpeted floor in her bare feet. You steal a lightning fast glance at her feet, noting how wide they are compared to your other aunts. Being polite, you look up at her face, and you can already tell you're in for something you probably won't like. She stares at you through her thin-rimmed rectangular glasses and folds her arms across her chest.

"You've been down here all day," she says with a bit of a punch in her voice.

There's not much you can say that will appease her, so you simply say, "I've been down here, just doing my thing."

Aunt Vicky snorts. "Uh-huh. And while you've been doing 'your thing', your aunts and I have had to do work around this lodge by ourselves. You haven't cleaned anything, you haven't cooked any meals while we've been here..."

"I just want to have some fun while I'm here," you say. "And I like building models, hence why I'm here."

"You're not going to spend all your time down here with those silly models!" shouts Aunt Vicky. "You're going to do some things for us when we want them!"

You want to shout something back, but you're not sure what to say. Part of it is because you can't think of a quick response, and part of it is because the years of control your aunts have laid upon you has made you submissive. So rather than say anything, you just go back to listening to your iPod and looking over the model. Unfortunately, that was a bad move. You have now drawn the ire of your aunt.

"Don't just ignore me like that!" she shouts. "If you think you can tune me out, I'll put to an end to any of your distractions!" With that, she storms over to your table and...
11.title: Aunt Vicky

choices: She crushes your earbuds, the only pair you brought with you.
She crushes both the iPod and earbuds.
111.content:
Aunt Vicky comes over to the table and pulls your iPod away from you. Your earbuds pop out, and for a moment you feel like your ears were about to go with them, considering the amount of force your aunt used. The earbuds dangle toward the floor, and your aunt clutches the iPod in her hand.

"I'm sorry!" you say quickly. "I wasn't trying to ignore you."

"Then what was it?" your aunt demands of you.

"I...I just...I..." you stammer and can't get a sentence out. That doesn't help your case any.

"You need some discipline," says Aunt Vicky. She looks at your iPod in her hand, then unplugs the earbuds and looks them over in other hand. You can tell she's planning something, but what? Whatever it is, it doesn't look good for you.

112.content:
With a few strides, Aunt Vicky swoops to the table and snatches up your model car. Instinctively you stick an arm out to snatch it back, but you're not quick enough to get it.

"Do I have your attention now?" asks Aunt Vicky.

You take out your headphones and leave them on the table. Taking a breath, you say, "Okay, I'm sorry if you thought I tuned you out..."

Aunt Vicky cuts you off right away. "Don't give me that," she snaps. "I'm your aunt, and I'm more important than some stupid toy."

Rather than argue semantics, you just say, "You're right. I'm sorry."

Aunt Vicky looks over your model car and huffs. "Why are you even wasting time with this? You're 18 years old now. You'll be starting college in the fall. There's no reason for you to be playing with toys."

Again, there is an issue with semantics, but you can tell that if you say anything, you'll just be asking for trouble. So you sit there and let your aunt continue talking.

"Do you need me to help you grow up?" she asks. You say nothing. She looks at your model car again. "Maybe I can get you out of this toy phase," she says. She lightly tosses the car onto the floor. The impact is enough to make one of the wheels pop off.

"Don't do that!" you say.

"It's time you grew up," Aunt Vicky says. She places her foot on top of the car. You know what's coming, and you frantically try to stop it.

"Please, Aunt Vicky, stop!" you say. Your heart is racing with anxiety.

Aunt Vicky says nothing. She simply sighs.
112.title: She takes your model car.

choices: Aunt Vicky is talking to the other two about what just happened.

You're too far away to tell; investigate further.
1121.content:
With a huff, Aunt Vicky kicks the car back over to you. It rolls a couple times along the way, but there doesn't appear to be any major damage done. "Next time I won't be so forgiving," she says. She briskly leaves the room. You can hear her stomping up the stairs.

You take a moment to calm yourself down, placing the model car back on the table. For once, in a very rare moment, one of your aunts did not destroy one of your possessions. It's something they all like to do, almost like a hobby. A sick hobby, of course.

You decide that it would be best for a slight change of scenery. What that means to you is not yet clear, though. You could try going outside and taking a walk, though you would likely have to get past one or more of your aunts first. Deciding you would 'cross that bridge if you came to it', you head up the stairs to the main level where the door is located. As you reach the top of the stairs, you hear a noise. It's faint, like it's coming from a few rooms down, but some activity is going on.

What is the source of the noise you hear?

Aunt Vicky sounds furious. "He was ignoring me! Me! I'm telling you, he's rude, he's lazy and he's developmentally retarded!"
"Vicks, don't throw the dictionary at me, I'm trying to concentrate." That was Aunt Fifi.
"She means that he's an overgrown child, and a spoilt one at that." That was Aunt Maggie.
"I nearly took that stupid toy away from him and smashed it! I don't know why I didn't."
"Oh, don't let him get to you, Vicky" said Maggie, "He is a big spoilt kid and we all know it and none of us wanted him here spoiling our girls' vacation, but he's stuck here with us and what we want goes. If he bothers any of us he'll end up regretting it, right?"
"I can't believe the rubbish he spends his time on..."
"Toys!"
"Looking at flowers!"
"Is that what he does out there?"

They decend into cruel laughter and you quietly and quickly get away from them. You hurry downstairs to one of your quiet places. Outside, through the garden and into the copse of trees beyond the end. You sit in the leafy hollow trying to relax and forget the mocking voices.

It's beautiful here. The sun dapples down through the canopy onto the tangled grass and multicoloured patchwork quilt of moss. The light strikes a group of bluebells, highlighting their delicate flowers against the darker backdrop. There are violet irises, there drooping flowers seeming as sad as you do and a good deal prettier and a wealth of other flowers you can't identify. In the damper shade of the trees and shrubs grow incredible mushrooms of all kinds of shapes and colours, irridescent hues and mottled canopies on ghostly white flesh. amidst it all the place is alive with inverterbrate life. Snails, beetles, ants and all manner of spindley beautiful creatures scurrying about on their business. This place might look empty to some but you tread carefully here, keeping to safe spots where no plant or creature will be harmed.

But you aunts! How can you be trapped here with them? How can they treat you like this? There's only one thing to do. What you always do. You try to relax and focus on all the good things you have here, those you brought with you and those you found already here:

this place!
your models
your tablet
your phone
the garden, which you've done a lot of work on over the last few years
the meadow
the stream and it's bank
Your pet snails Ginnie, Nicole, Kara, Stephany and Ami
your writing and art
the childhood toys you found in the attic
The ant colony on the lawn and the ones in this place and the meadow
the model railway set which you've been adding to
your doll, Abbey who you've had since you were a kid along with Lucy Mouse and Chloe rabbit who you sleep with but do not tell your aunts about!
Anona, the tiny doll your only ever girlfriend gave you (likewise)
your Citadel miniatures which you've been painting
your comics
Your action figures, who inspire you to bravery
your original 1980s Optimus Prime

That's a lot of good things and even if you are stuck here your aunts can't take all that away from you!

Feeling better you head back inside only to find that

Your Aunt Fifi comes down the stairs. She's wearing a black tank-top and some shorts. She is also wearing her favorite pair of black flip-flops, and you take an extra second to glance down at her feet. You then quickly raise your eyes to hers. A small grin appears on her face.

"There you are," she says. She walks over to you and sits down on the couch next to you, looking at the work you've done. "How's it going?" she asks.

You shrug. "Not bad," you say. "I've just about finished."

Aunt Fifi nods. "You know, your other aunts have been complaining that you haven't pulled your weight on this vacation. They're wondering if they should do something to get you...motivated; I guess that would be a good word to use."

You draw in a deep breath. You can feel that something is coming, and it can't be good. "What do you think?" you ask.

Aunt Fifi shrugs. "I haven't really thought about it much. We are on vacation, after all, and I suppose you are entitled to do a little less than you normally would."

You feel troubled by that statement. It sounds like something Aunt Fifi would say, but there's almost always something between the lines.

"Here's what I think," Aunt Fifi says. "I think there are ways you can make yourself useful to us beyond the obvious things, like cooking and cleaning." While she's talking to you, she crosses one leg over the other and starts slapping the heel of her foot with her flip-flop. This catches your attention, but you try not to be too obvious about looking.

Butterflies start to form in your stomach. You know Aunt Fifi has something planned; you just wish she would get on with it. "What did you have in mind?" you ask.

"Well," says Aunt Fifi, "I did a small run outside this morning. It felt good, the weather was nice and all, but my feet are killing me." She slips her feet out of her flip-flops and places them into your lap. "What do you say to earning your keep by giving me a foot massage?"

You hesitate. Your heart starts to beat faster. You look down at Aunt Fifi's copper-painted toes, which she wiggles for you.

"Don't worry, I showered after the run. They won't be sweaty or anything nasty like that," she says. "You should consider yourself lucky."

You don't feel very lucky right now.

A devilish smirk is on Fifi's face. "But it's so much fun," she says. "I kinda like it. Not just the crushing, you know. It's the whole thought of being a giant. It's exciting to me."

You have no idea how to respond to that. Your heart starts racing.

"Tell you what," Fifi says. "Maybe I won't tell the girls. But if I don't...well, there's something I'd like to do myself."

"What's that?" you ask.

"You'll have to find out yourself," she says. "Just tell me you don't want the others to know, and we'll go from there. What do you say?"
1313.title: Stay there embarrassed but continue rubbing.

13131.content:
"I would like it if you didn't tell them," you say to Aunt Fifi.

"Aww, listen to you being all polite," says Fifi. "I guess you're not a complete brat after all. Well, if you don't want them to know, that's fine. But I wanna have some fun of my own with you."

"I'm a little concerned about this 'fun' you have in mind," you say.

"Hey, I didn't say it would be fun for you...but maybe it will be. Wait right here." Fifi gets up and goes into her room. After a minute or two, she comes back holding a vial of blue liquid.

"What's that?" you ask.

"A little something I've been working on in the lab," Fifi says. You recall that she is a noteworthy chemist where she lives, though you don't know much beyond that.

"What does it do?" You start to get a little nervous, but you don't know what exactly to be nervous about.

"Well, since you enjoy our big feet so much -- and I'm sure you like mine the most, right? Well, anyway, this will give you the chance to experience my feet on a scale you've only ever dreamed of." Fifi grins.

"What does that mean?"

Fifi sighs. "God, you're so stupid sometimes." She pauses. "Well, I guess you wouldn't really know. This is top secret stuff I have here. Here's the short version. This liquid reacts differently to men and women. If a man were to drink this, the chemical reaction would cause his body to shrink. If a woman drinks it, she has the ability to grow. But not too much, of course. The woman can control how much she grows, up to 50 feet I think, but the man can't control how much he shrinks. It almost always goes to 6 inches."

"This is crazy," you say. "There's no way stuff like this exists."

"Oh, but it does," says Fifi. "And that's what we're going to play with now. Here's where you come in, since you're the foot-lover. I'm giving you the choice. Do you want to shrink, or do you want me to grow?"
13131.title: Beg her not to tell your other aunts.

choices: Stomp the model car you were working on to pieces.
Make you massage her feet at your new size.
131311.content:
With shaking hands you take the vial from your Aunt Fifi. You looks curiously at the blue liquid inside. Could this really make you tiny sized? It really would be fantastic to be the size of your models and getting to see how detailed they were if they were full sized. That and you could... Your eyes drift down to your Aunt's feet and instantly dart back up to meet her gaze. Of course she's grinning.

"I bet you'd love to give them a massage if you were only a few inches tall. Being able to see my feet in so much detail before your tiny little eyes. So what are you waiting for? Gulp it down and see what happens!" Fifi urges, wiggling her toes which you try very hard not to glance down at.

It's probably some kind of prank. The stuff in vial could just be some extremely sour juice and she'll get a huge laugh out of you suffering and waiting for it to wear off. But what if she really was telling the truth? She was a chemist after all and this would be the most amazing thing in the world to you! Then again... Could you really trust your Aunts? Who knows what kind of horrible things they'd get you to do.

'Yeah like massage their feet,' you think to yourself, 'Cause that would be just sooooo terrible.' You really would like it, and if they were going to force you to do it, who cares! Of course you felt awkward about it, but really didn't care. This beautiful woman was sitting before you, waiting to tease you with the wildest fantasy you could imagine. Or laugh at you for believing her.

Taking a deep breath, you down the entire vial.

It tastes like berries in some sort of syrup. Not exactly what you were expecting. There was no strange taste or anything. You realize you're staring at the vial and you look up to Fifi who is sitting there wide eyed staring at you.

"What?" You ask in confusion.

She sits down on the couch and takes your hands, "I really didn't think you'd do it! You little pervert, you'd really make yourself shrink just to get what you want?"

Ah so it was all a test. You take your hands back and lean away on the couch, "Thanks. Just what I needed. I really hope you're not going to tell anyone about this."

"Tell anyone? I'm going to need your Aunts help to look after you at your new size. Did you really think I was joking? I figured you'd just be like 'Oh no no, of course not Aunt Fifi, I wouldn't want to shrink for real,' or something," She speakings in a deep voice, imitating what you'd sound like.

After she's said this, you realize your clothing does feel loose. Looking down at yourself you see just how baggy your clothing is getting. You stand up and fall to the floor on your hands and knees, "Is, this really happening? This has got to be some kind of a joke!"

"It's no joke! I just didn't think you'd really do it!" She grins and narrows her eyes, "But, no one knows about this yet."

Looking up at her you see just how happy Aunt Fifi seems to be about that. "Come on! You've got to help me change back to normal!"

She laughs and stands up, looking down at your shrinking form. "I don't think so nephew. You've still been staring at our feet this whole trip and now I can finally have some fun with that. I bet you'd just love to be looking up at the sole of my foot like a tiny helpless bug. You'll soon be that size after all!"

As you reached only a couple feet tall you began to realize she was right. There was nothing you could do to stop your Aunt from doing whatever she wanted. Sure, you could make a run for it, but at your constantly shrinking size who knows if you could even get away. It seems like there was nothing left to do but just go along with Fifi as you shrunk down into a pile of your own loose clothing.

Fifi rolls her eyes, "Well that just won't do. Here." She drops some clothes on you that seem to be from a doll. Just basic shorts and a tee shirt, sort of like what you were wearing. Getting dressed you stare up at her huge body towering overhead.

You calmly breath and get your bearings at a height of only three inches tall now. However you don't have time to think before Fifi decides to...
131311.title: Drink it yourself (you shrink)

choices: You are on Cloud Nine - You love her massive feet!
1313112.content:
"Now my little nephew massage my feet."

This would be rather difficult but you decide that obedience was probably a good idea right about now. You walk closer to her bare feet... at this point there were one of two things that could happen in this scenario.

1. By being so small her feet and their natural smell would be much more potent. At your height if they were at all stinky in the slightest it would be like being next to a gas chamber.

2. You were scared but you were also thrilled - your foot fetish made you incredibly aroused by being able to adore such massive feet!
1313112.title: Make you massage her feet at your new size.

choices: Begin crying and pleading to be returned to normal size
Rub Fifi's feet or she might get mad.
The smell is strong, but you can take it.  Maybe you should take a taste too?
13131121.content:
This was seriously freaky. Here you were, 3 inches tall, staring directly at your Aunt Fifi's feet, her toes wiggling in welcome. You are so small it would take one short step to squish you like a spider. If it had been Aunt Vicki or Aunt Maggie, you would be truly scared as they have always treated you and your possessions harshly. Sure, Aunt Fifi had joined in on occasion, but she always seemed to have a little smile playing about her face like she knew a special secret and now you know what, it was the secret of your fetish. You look up, way up to her face. Maybe its just your size, but that smile seems to have morphed into something more possessive.

"Are you just going to stand there until my sisters show up or are you going to give me that sweet foot massage?" she said, glancing up the stairs like they were on their way. Go for it, you tell yourself. After all, that other potion could make you big again, that's what she said, right?. You head straight to her feet when it hits you like a rock to the head. The smell! With your nose just an inch away from her feet, the acrid sweaty smell burned your nostrils and caused you to kneel over and gag.

"Oh poor nephew, if you'd asked me about the potion, I could have warned you that about a third of the subjects experienced massively increased smell capacity, like that of a dog. But you are always so impulsive with everything except those silly models you are always building. Oh well, dogs like the smell of feet and so do you. So get rubbing. She didn't wait for you to act, but moved her bare sole directly on top of you, not with her full weight but enough to pin you down.
13131121.title: Bad Smell to the Max!

choices: Fifi explains the complex science of why her clothes grow with her.
Fifi's tank top and shorts begin ripping as her body begins to expand!
131312.content:
"I'm not going to drink that! There's no way something like that can exist and I won't play your stupid game. You just want me to do it to confirm all these ideas you have about me," is your reply. You're actually quite shocked by how angry that came out, but it's probably a mix of embarassment and your lack of trust of your aunts.

Fifi smiles and looks down at the vial, "Of course you haven't heard that something like this exists. Like I said, it's new. Something I've just come up with in the lab."

This sounds like something out of one of the sci-fi books you've read before. You still remember your favourite that involved one of the women from a group of space explorers growing giant when she found some size changing slime on a far off planet. She'd always been angered by her fellow explorers and ended up stomping their spacecraft to pieces under her bare feet. That just made you think again of the model car you'd been working on before Aunt Fifi interrupted you.

"You can't make yourself grow. All you want to do is make me look like an even bigger fool than you have already," you snap back at your Aunt.

Fifi just rolls her eyes, "I know what you've been thinking. You'd love it if this was true. Getting to watch my big bare feet take on a real vehicle for once. Your Aunt Vicky has been wanting to get rid of that old clunker of hers. I think all of us have shown you how much we can smash up your plastic models underfoot. Imagine how great it will be to see a real car with it's grinding, bending metal under my huge bare foot!"

By now, you were trying to control your embarassment and your breathing. All of what your Aunt was describing sounded fantastic, but of course it was just a ploy so she could make you look even worse. She'd just love it if you went along with her and excitedly begged her to drink her formula and smash your Aunt Vicky's car. They'd all get a great laugh out of it and make fun of you for weeks. That's why you'd spent most of your time building models. You wanted to be alone.

"Or maybe," Fifi began, "You'd like it more if I came stomping after you instead. Chasing down my naughty little nephew with my huge cruel feet through the woods! Fifi Fi Fo Fum!" Your Aunt stomps around the room a bit, pretending to be chasing a tiny version of you. It doesn't help your embarassment when you realize you've been staring at her feet the whole time and loving every moment, even if you do feel insulted.

You cross your arms and try to cover up your obvious blushing cheeks by flat out glaring at her, "Well then prove it to me! Drink whatever that is you've got in that vial there and grow all big and scary."

Fifi grins and does exactly that. You instantly feel strange in the bottom of your stomach, your mind reeling with wishes that it really would work and your wildest dreams would really come true.

But there's nothing. Just your Aunt standing there like she's frozen in time, holding the vial. Turning away with your arms still crossed, you've just about given up when you hear the vial drop to the hardwood floor with a clatter. Looking back you see your Aunt stomp the tiny glass container with her bare foot and her eyes go wide as she does indeed slowly begin to grow!

Standing up and stumbling over anything in your way you reach the corner of the room and press your back into it. Was she really going to grow that big? The whole resort would fall down around you! Then another thought crosses your mind and without even thinking how awkward it sounds you blurt you, "Your clothes aren't going to grow along with you!" It was more of a warning to Aunt Fifi than anything else, but she just looks and you and laughs.
131312.title: Have Fifi drink it (she grows)

choices: Choose to 'play' with your models. You've had enough of her
132.content:
Aunt Fifi pouts, acting disappointed and says "aww, I thought you liked me," then with one sudden movement she swings her long legs past you and stands snatching the model car you've been working on in her hand, a wheel falling off and bouncing off of her bare foot.
Your eyes widen, "No! Please don't damage that Aunt Fifi! I've been working on it for hours! It really means something..."
"Sssh," she says and drops the Camaro to the floor, her eyes fixed on your crumpling face as she steps on it. The beautiful white car is completely covered by her bare sole with a terrible crunch as her foot settles flat.
Your shoulders sag and she actually smiles and plants a kiss on your forehead, giggling. "Now can I have my massage or would you like to play with your toys?"
132.title: Crunch

choices: She calls the other aunts down to the room.
1323.content:
"How could you do that to me?" you say incredulously. "I've been working on that for hours!"

Fifi shrugs. "You should have given me a massage," is all she says.

"Forget it!" you say. "I'm not here to serve you!"

"Yes you are," Fifi says. "You should consider yourself lucky that we let you play with those stupid models in the first place. So next time when I say I want a massage, you damn well better hop to it."

You fold your arms over your chest. "Hell no," you say.

"Is that how it's going to be?" says Fifi. "Well, in that case..."
1323.title: Complain!

choices: Give in and massage her feet.
Hold firm, and say goodbye to your models.
13231.content:
Fifi picks up another model car that had been sitting on the shelf. "Think of all the time you put into making this," she taunts. "What a waste." She opens her hand and drop the car to the floor. Pieces break on impact. What's left is immediately crushed under her bare heel. She stomps on it several times, making sure it's completely destroyed.

"Stop!" you shout at her.

"Why should I?" she says. This time she throws a model house to the ground. That, too, meets its end under her foot. The sound of crunching plastic fills the room.

"Aunt Fifi, NO!" You rush at her, but she quickly pushes you to the ground. While you lay down there, she dumps more models onto the ground. As she reaches for ones further down the shelf, she purposely steps on ones on the ground. You hear nothing but crunching and cracking. You watch helplessly as your hobby is reduced to broken plastic under your aunt's foot.

"Now, let's try this again," she says, throwing more models to the ground. She plants a foot on your chest. "I want a massage. And this time, you're going to give it to me. If you don't, I'll smash every single one of these fucking models and make you watch. And if that's not enough for you...well, we'll see what your other aunts have in mind for punishment."

You stare up at her now angry face.

"I'm waiting for an answer," Fifi says.
13231.title: She destroys more models.

info.brief_description: You've always been dominated by your aunts, but this vacation becomes a hellish nightmare.
info.description:
You're 18 years old, and you have been sent on vacation with your 3 aunts to a secluded resort lodge. You try to avoid them because they are cruel and sadistic toward you, but they always find a way to make your life miserable. To make matters worse -- though you could never admit it to them -- your foot fetish causes you to be attracted to their feet. Just when you think you can put up with them for the summer, they have a new way to torment you: they shrink you down to a few inches tall. Now it's up to you to get away from them.

Characters:
You - the 18-year-old and "hero" of the story.

Aunt Vicky - 40 years old, 5'10", black hair, size 9 feet. Occasionally goes barefoot, but often wears open-toed sandals. Of the 3 aunts, she enjoys torturing you the most.

Aunt Maggie - 36 years old, 6'1", brown hair, size 10 feet. Nearly always goes barefoot around the lodge and does not hesitate to crush things with her feet, even if it's just to spite you.

Aunt Fifi - 33 years old, 5'9", short brown hair, size 9.5 feet. Usually goes barefoot, but has a pair of black flip-flops that she likes to wear sometimes. Her cruelty toward you stems from a sadistic sense of playfulness, like she gets a lot of fun from making you miserable.

Place:
A lodge on the top of a large hill. It's part of a series of lodges that are normally reserved for skiers in the winter, but are rented out as luxury accomodations in the summer (like now). It is 3 stories high, with virtually any amenities you can think of.


Ground Rules:

Make sure ANY and ALL giantesses are at least 18 years of age!

Please keep this a foot-related/shrinking/giantess story. No sex/toilet/vore or anything like that. Crushing of objects (not just the threat of crushing the main character) is acceptable and actually encouraged. Remember, these are sadistic aunts.

HOWEVER, in accordance with the above, please keep the crushing to only inanimate objects or the main character. NO crushing of things like snails or other live creatures. That's way too icky for me.

I would like the story to branch out a few chapters before the shrinking begins, but that's not a hard-set rule. Normal-sized interaction can be just as good as the shrunk/giant interaction.

Once the shrinking commences, please keep it to nothing smaller than 6 inches. I am not a micro fan, and 6 inches still offers plenty of good interaction.

Growth is also allowed, but only by the aunts/female characters. If you do choose growth, it's got to be small, like not more than 50 feet.

PLEASE check your spelling and grammar. I'm not asking for absolute perfection and Pulitzer Prize-winning writing, but at least make an effort.

Short chapters are okay, but I want there to be enough description and detail to make it worthwhile.

If you're not sure about something you want to add or just have a question, feel free to message me.

IMPORTANT: As the creator, I reserve the right to edit/delete chapters.
